resources.string:
The privacy and personal data policy and practices of GWS. 

 GWS Movies Sdn Bhd,and its affiliated related companies (GWS) 

 set out in this Privacy Policy and Personal Data Notice apply to 

 all personal data provided to GWS, whether in electronic form or 

 otherwise. By visiting and using www.gsc.com.my and 

 www.gwsmovies.com.my (GWS’s Website), any mobile 

 applications run and maintained by GWS (GWS Mobile 

 Application),and other services provided by GWS as 

 well as by providing personal data to GWS, 

 you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions 

 of this Privacy Policy and Personal Data Notice.If you do not 

 agree to such terms and conditions, please do not use or 

 access GWS’s Website or GWS Mobile Application, use the 

 services provided by GWS or provide any personal data to GWS.
This category is for viewing by all walks of life without age limit. The film potrays good values, decency and positive lessons as well as entertaining.

Viewers under 13 years of age need parental/guardian supervision while viewing. Scenes in the film consists elements of horror; scary; negative acts; suspense and frantic elements, but not excessive; elusive storyline; and elements that can disturb a child’s emotion.

This category is for viewers aged 18 and above. The film contains elements of horror, gory, and violent, but not excessive; adult scene that is not excessive; social, sensitive political and religious elements which require a high level understanding.
How can I apply to refund

Customers can apply for refunds under these circumstances: Issues pertaining to the cinemas facilities (e.g. air conditioning, seats, hall, lighting, electrical and/or plumbing). Issues pertaining to projection equipment (e.g. session breakdown, sound system and/or subpar visual quality).
Can I bring outside food into GWS

"Customers are required to purchase food and beverage from TGV Cinemas' snack bars. Food purchased outside of TGV Cinemas premises will not be allowed in the cinema/movie halls. Customers can place their outside food and beverage at the ticket tearing point before entering the cinema/movie halls. "
How I know if I have successfully pre-booked my F&B order
Upon completing payment, you will receive an email from us. The order details will be listed under the F&B section of the email.
Can I change the popcorn and drink flavour after payment?
No, you cannot.Any changes should be made prior to completing payment.
"If FAQ do not have help you solve the problem Please comment below "
